48 Bright colors 36 Bright colors 24 Bright colors Black, 18 count 18 Bright colors

18 Vibrant Colored Fine Liner Marker Pens from ​iBayam

Lets you express yourself with true style and color. Available in 18 colors with an ultra fine tip. The iBayam fine liner marker pen set provides bold and expressive lines and is great for editing documents and papers. This writing instrument features point guard technology to protect the felt tip, as well as a water-based ink that doesn’t bleed through paper.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL FINELINER PENS

The iBayam fine line pen set is ideal for journaling, planner, drawing lines & details, writing, sketching, adult coloring books, art projects, artists fine-ink drawings and coloring small intricate patterns. Doesn’t bleed through paper.

Classic writing tool in modern colors

Our products are comfortable to use and last long. Well, When you need precision and clarity in your color drawings. There’s no better way to get it than with a fine liner pen set!

Inspired Coloring Marker Pens, Comfortable in your daily life

Slim easy-to-control shape and a smooth fine porous point come together to help you perfect and personalize your coloring sheet. Turn everyday writing into 18 colors with iBayam fineliner Pens. Treat yourself to a range of water-based ink that won’t bleed through paper. Enjoy juicy, nonstop writing and drawing thanks to some kind person. Add a pop of fun color to journals, planner, notebook, notes, drawings, adult coloring pages.

Water-based ink

The water-based ink is specifically designed to reduce smearing and not bleed through paper for neat notes, doodles and adult coloring pages. Perfect for drawing lines & details, journaling, coloring, writing, sketching, marking, signing, manga, animation, graphic and design.

Compatible with Stencils

Perfect for Journal / Notebook / Diary / Scrapbook / DIY / Drawing Template Stencil.

Premium Point

iBayam Fineliner Pen’s ultra-fine metal tip provides outstanding super smooth performance for fine ink drawing of artwork, coloring small and intricate patternand and home work.

VIBRANT COLORS Smart Fineliner Color Pens Set 18 Unique Colors, 0.38 mm Fine Point Colored Pens, Assorted Color Fine Tip Marker Pens, Minimal Bleed Thru Ink. Perfect as Journal Pens, Planner Pens, Journaling Pens, Teacher Pens, School Supplies, Office Supplies, Planner Accessories. Premium gift set for the family, friends, co-workers, Birthday, Christmas.
SMOOTH WRITING Colorful Fine tip marker pen set with superfine, metal-clad fine tipped and outstanding performance in all areas of writing, drawing, coloring, easy and comfortable to write. You will also find them great for home, office, work, business, colleague, church, club, and organazition activities.
GREAT marker pens for drawing lines & details, journal, planner, calendar, agenda, notebook, note taking, painting, writing, coloring, sketch, marker, signing, manga, animation, graphic, design, illustration, included artists fine-ink drawings and coloring small intricate patterns. Perfect Colored Pens for Middle School, High School, College, Bachelor, Graduate, Women, Men, Adult Coloring.
Colored art writing drawing porous point pens. Water-based ink, minimal bleed thru (except very thin paper), these fiber-tipped pens create fine lines and intense water-based colors. Packaged in a soft transparent vinyl bag.
WELL PACKAGE — Our fine line pens come in a nice plastic storage case with fold over snap closure which can be easily placed in backpacks. For using in school, travel or used in the home and office. Great Back to School Stationary, planner or journaling supplies for Christmas, Birthday, Mother’s Day, Easter Day, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving Day, Party, New Year’s.

Previous page

  2. School & Office Supplies

    Visit the Store

  3. Bible Journaling Supplies

    Visit the Store

  4. Art Supplies

    Visit the Store

  5. Welcome to Mr. Pen!

    Having firsthand experience teaching in at-risk schools in different parts of the United States, seeing the daily struggles of students and teachers, we, a few business-minded teachers, founded Mr. Pen with a simple purpose: serving the schools in our community by providing them with high quality and affordable school supplies and tools to help them in their efforts.

  6. Our Goal:

    We founded Mr. Pen with a simple purpose to serve the schools in our community by providing them with high quality and affordable school supplies and tools to help them in their efforts.

    We want to ensure Mr. Pen can provide superior quality, the most affordable products, and amazing online shopping experience from the beginning.

    As we aim to supply excellent conventional office and school products, our team of engineers and designers will do their best job to create innovative solutions for offices and schools to maximize efficiency and learning.

Next page

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

【Large Upgraded Version】Increase capacity, improve comfort and relieve back pressure.
【Women’s Travel Backpack】This backpack is made of waterproof and durable polyester with good breathability and heat dissipation, with two padded shoulder straps, providing light carrying and strength enhancement, reducing the pressure on the shoulders, keeping long Time’s cool down. It’s tough, sturdy and won’t fade.
【Separate shoe compartment design and wet pocket】Main pocket x 2, laptop compartment x 2, and many other pockets for different purposes. Wet bags are made of high-density waterproof material to help you separate wet and dry items, and if you have wet clothes or towels, you can put them in the wet bag. A separate shoe cabinet can help you better carry your shoes and store them in your travel bag.
【USB Charging Port】Built-in charging port to charge your phone anytime, anywhere.(The power bank and data cable in the pictures are fodisplay purposes,not gifts, need to be provided by yourself)
【Anti-theft multifunctional backpack】There is a zipper pocket on the back of the bag, which can store valuables such as mobile phones and iPads, which is anti-theft and convenient. Versatile Backpack: Hybrid (backpack/duffel bag/shoulder bag/travel bag) conversion. Several different ways can be used. It can be used as an everyday backpack, a roomy college bag, a professional backpack for a laptop or everyday use anywhere, perfect for weekend getaways, occasional use.

item.title: BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape, 19.8 Feet, 4-Count Pack of white Correction Tape, Fast, Clean and Easy to Use Tear-Resistant Tape Office or School Supplies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make fast, easy and precise corrections on even the toughest errors with BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape. This tear-resistant, film-based BIC Wite-Out Brand Correction Tape comes in a tape dispenser that offers maximum comfort and control, so you can easily and accurately correct mistakes. The tear resistance offers ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:55:04 UTC – Details)


Make fast, easy and precise corrections on even the toughest errors with BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape. This tear-resistant, film-based BIC Wite-Out Brand Correction Tape comes in a tape dispenser that offers maximum comfort and control, so you can easily and accurately correct mistakes. The tear resistance offers tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last. The Wite-Out Brand tape requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip, so you can instantly write or type your corrections over it. A translucent body lets you see exactly how much BIC correction tape remains and a self-winding wheel lets you easily rewind the correction tape should it become loose. One pack contains four tape dispensers, each containing 39.3 feet of white correction tape. If you’re looking for reliable office or school supplies for lefties and righties, look no further than this white correction tape. From America’s No. 1 correction brand*, choose BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape for a high-quality, safe and affordable product you can trust. *Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service and Commercial Tracking Service, U.S., based on actual unit sales; 12ME June 2022 combined.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5.25 x 8.13 x 0.75 inches; 3.1 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ WOTAPP418-WHI
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 27, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ BIC Corporation
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0007L1W0E
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Mexico

One 4-count pack of BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape, a tear-resistant, film-based correction tape with a tape dispenser offering maximum comfort and control
Instantly write or type your corrections with this white correction tape, which requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip
Clear correction tape dispenser lets you see exactly how much tape remains and the self-winding wheel lets you rewind the tape if it becomes loose
Each tape dispenser contains 39.3 feet of white correction tape to offer a long-lasting option for school or office supplies
Suitable for righties and lefties, these BIC Wite-Out Brand tapes offer a wide variety of use amongst students and employees for their documents and assignments

Read more

Strong Correction Tape from America’s #1 Correction Brand*

Instant, Tidy Corrections

BIC Wite-Out Brand correction tape applies dry, allowing you to quickly fix mistakes without the mess or waiting time of a correction fluid. Offering greater strength than paper-based tape, this film-based tape is more tear resistant to create tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last.

Easy to Apply

Dispensing the tape is easy: simply position the tip flat on the area to be corrected, press down firmly, and gently move from left to right. If tape becomes loose, press tip of tape firmly on paper, make slow motion towards the right, and repeat until tape rewinds.

Translucent Dispenser

The translucent dispenser allows you to see at a glance how much tape is remaining. You can apply the tape in a controlled, comfortable fashion.

From the brand

NISEALYT Store

Put our cute stickers in the Christmas stockings as surprise gifts for kids, teens, adults.

About NISEALYT

NISEALYT is a manufacturer of toys for children, teens and adults.

Since its birth, NISEALYT has been committed to bringing people high-quality and inexpensive products, which can stimulate children’s aesthetic ability and practical ability.

We have excellent designers and professional printing machines, the products are beautiful, practical, novel design trend, colorful and rich, vinyl material, safe, waterproof and non-toxic.

Cute Stickers

Christmas Gifts

Party Favors

Room Decor

300 Pcs Sports mixed stickers (including 50pcs american football,50pcs volleyball,50pcs baseball,50pcs basketball,50pcs soccer,50pcs ice hockey style). Zero duplication and large quantity designs suitable for sharing with friends,classmates,family.
Cute sports stickers are absolutely perfect for children,teens and adults who are fanatical with outdoor exercise & health life.Funny back to school supplies for incentives and rewards for students,also can be the family prizes which your kids must love them.
Super cool sports stickers pack for Christmas stocking stuffers and party favors, birthday and holiday surprise gifts. They are perfect for Merry Christmas decorations such as DIY the cards, envelope, candies bags, goodies bags, cupcake and home decor.
Stickers sizes ranging from 1.5 to 3 inches,well used for any DIY craft projects like water bottles,mugs,laptop,notebook,phone case,scrapbook,journal,folders,skateboard,luggage,guitar,helmet,bumper,bike,motor,car,locker,door,desk,fridge and room decor.
Waterproof vinyl stickers are made of clear and delicate patterns printed in HD,with strong glue that is safe,non-toxic.Easy to tear off the back paper and can be used repeatedly,will not shrink off and does not leave any residue.Overall thick & durable.

300 Pcs Sports Theme Stickers,varity of american football, volleyball, baseball, basketball, soccer and ice hockey designs for choose no matter what kind of fan you are. Waterproof,clear and delicate patterns,easy to tear off the back paper and can be used repeatedly,will not shrink off and does not leave any residue,thick & durable.Believe us! Believe NISEALYT!

Using your imagination,creativity and hands-on ability to decorate your items with colorful stickers to make life full of vitality.

COLORFUL LINED: The new fashion comes with lines, 6 pads, 3×3 inch, 6 different colors with black auxiliary wire transparent clearly visible sticky notes. (300 sheets)
FRIENDLY HELPFUL HINTS: In order to get a better user’s experience, we recommend you to use pencils, ballpoint pens, oil-based markers, （Not recommended to use pens, water-based pens, gel pens, common markers, unless you can wait for handwriting to dry after using water-based pen. Do not wipe handwriting immediately)
EXTENSIVE USE: These new lined transparent sticky notes are popular and can be used for everything from notes, daily home tips, classification management notes pads, study & reading annotating message reminders, research & business meetings memos, and more.
FEATURE OF NOTES：Small and lightweight, you can carry it everywhere. Such as:Universities, offices, schools, libraries, LABS, parties, etc. The black lines help you write neatly and make note-taking look good.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: Made of high transparency & can write PET material allows you to see the text and information on the bottom when pasted on books, notebooks, computers, notes, etc. It’s your work, study and scientific research daily life supplies.
